title: Some of Our Favorite Memes From the Avengers: Doomsday Livestream
description: As almost 30 actors were announced for the Marvel film, the internet had a blast joking about it.
author: Germain Lussier
excerpt: As almost 30 actors were announced for the Marvel film, the internet had a blast joking about it.
text: As almost 30 actors were announced for the Marvel film, the internet had a blast joking about it. It took almost five and a half hours, but on Wednesday, Marvel Studios announced the cast of next year‚Äôs big summer release, Avengers: Doomsday. They were revealed in a simple but stretched-out PR stunt in which 27 director‚Äôs chairs, each bearing an actor‚Äôs name, were revealed about every 15 minutes or so on a livestream. It then ended with the one cast member we did know about, Robert Downey Jr., appearing. That long break between each reveal gave plenty of time for the internet to have fun with the stunt which, we assume, is exactly what Disney and Marvel wanted. Fans joked about who could appear in the movie, who would appear in the movie, who they want to see in the movie, and so much more. Brands got involved, the cuts got deeper, and while the whole thing took the better part of a day, it was all pretty fun. Below is just a small sampling of some of our favorite memes from the Avengers: Doomsday cast announcement, which you can watch right here and read more about here. He made a name for himself. #AvengersDoomsday pic.twitter.com/hGoX7yHY6z ‚Äî MT (@MasterTainment) March 26, 2025 Me arriving at Marvel Studios if Scarlet Witch isn't in Avengers Doomsday: #AvengersDoomsday pic.twitter.com/9lzKV5b3hI ‚Äî SpectreSaunders (@SpectreSaunders) March 26, 2025 Karla Sof√≠a Gasc√≥n will return as Emilia P√©rez in ‚ÄòAVENGERS: DOOMSDAY‚Äô pic.twitter.com/oZznilPr6j ‚Äî zo√´ rose bryant (@zoerosebryant) March 26, 2025 #AvengersDoomsday pic.twitter.com/wcxc7PocLB ‚Äî Ôº°ÔΩåÔΩèÔΩéÔΩÖÔΩÇÔΩèÔΩô (@ItzVarun_____) March 26, 2025 It's 2032. How much they've grown, and how much I've missed since I started watching the Live Stream. #AvengersDoomsday pic.twitter.com/bb4mfo8bQW ‚Äî Sean O'Connell (@Sean_OConnell) March 26, 2025 NO WAY?! #AvengersDoomsday pic.twitter.com/kRpjRREXNY ‚Äî jacob (@jtimsuggs) March 26, 2025 I AM RACING DOWN TO @MARVEL CARRYING A CHAIR WITH MY NAME ON IT RIGHT NOW! DON'T LET THEM STOP THE @AVENGERS LIVE FEED!!! https://t.co/xlZCblOVFC ‚Äî Ben Schwartz (@rejectedjokes) March 26, 2025 Take a seat, read some Archie comics. #AvengersDoomsday #ArchieIsMrJustice pic.twitter.com/m1WNVFff1T ‚Äî Archie Comics (@ArchieComics) March 26, 2025 Ren√©e Zellweger joins #OMITB Season 5! pic.twitter.com/W5Dk3jactg ‚Äî Only Murders in the Building üïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èüïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏èüïµÔ∏è‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è (@OnlyMurdersHulu) March 26, 2025 OH MY GOD??? #AvengersDoomsday pic.twitter.com/QsvlPuKfG6 ‚Äî ‚ãÜ mads ‚ãÜ DDBA Spoilers ‚ãÜ.‡≥É‡øî*:ÔΩ•‚ô° (@mdsmurdock) March 26, 2025 Yeah but he's playing Frasier, not The Beast. html:
As almost 30 actors were announced for the Marvel film, the internet had a blast joking about it.

It took almost five and a half hours, but on Wednesday, Marvel Studios announced the cast of next year‚Äôs big summer release, Avengers: Doomsday. They were revealed in a simple but stretched-out PR stunt in which 27 director‚Äôs chairs, each bearing an actor‚Äôs name, were revealed about every 15 minutes or so on a livestream. It then ended with the one cast member we did know about, Robert Downey Jr., appearing. That long break between each reveal gave plenty of time for the internet to have fun with the stunt which, we assume, is exactly what Disney and Marvel wanted.

Fans joked about who could appear in the movie, who would appear in the movie, who they want to see in the movie, and so much more. Brands got involved, the cuts got deeper, and while the whole thing took the better part of a day, it was all pretty fun.

Below is just a small sampling of some of our favorite memes from the Avengers: Doomsday cast announcement, which you can watch right here and read more about here.
